name: Crash Car Drive 2018
description:
Do you like crash driving games with real cars deformation? Take your car crash test by playing Crash Car Drive 2018 game with real crash of cars. If you want to see what happens due to car accidents then get ready to drive the super realistic car crashing simulator game 2018. Test the car crash destructible engine in crash stunt arena by performing tricky stunts through deadly obstacles like car punches, crushers, mid-air ramps, crash engine speeds and wreck-fast crushing beams. As a stunt rider perform extreme classic car stunts for wreckfast demolition.

Get ready to experience realistic car damage by smashing luxury limo, classic cars, monster trucks, muscle cars, 4x4 Prado jeep, heavy trucks, farmer tractor, coach bus, off-road SUV's, ATV quad bike, formula cars and other destructible cars into the crash arena. Perform impossible stunts on biggest impossible ramps while crashing cars engine. In this crash driving game, dare to become the fearless stuntman rider and drive the stunt cars on deadly and impossible tracks in the impossible game.

Features of Crash Car Drive 2018:
- It's Free and can be played offline
- More than 15 Vehicles
- Real car beam Destruction
- Real crash car simulation using the next gen physics
- Real accident simulator game to smash
- Deadly whirlpool smash field
- Thrash the damage car into metal pieces
- Challenging obstacle course for stuntman racers
- Extreme crash derby game ever to be on the rampage
- Extreme speed stunts for racing car stunts
